document_data.name: ''Weapon Master's Scale''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Weapon master's scale''''' was a magical suit of [[scale mail]] [[armor]] intended solely for [[weapon master]]s to wear.
document_data.Powers: It was ''+2 scale mail'' that granted the wearer greater readiness for combat and the ability to knock down foes. It could only be worn by a weapon master.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1374 DR]], the [[kobold]] [[bard]] turned merchant [[Deekin Scalesinger]] had the armor in his stock in the Merchant District of [[Neverwinter]].
